import {Component} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {AiFillHome} from 'react-icons/ai' import {HiFire} from 'react-icons/hi' import {CgPlayListAdd} from 'react-icons/cg' import {SiYoutubegaming} from 'react-icons/si' import NxtThemeContext from '../../Context' import NavItem from '../NavItem' import { SideBarContainer, SideNavBar, Heading, ContactIcons, Icon, Description, } from './StyledComponents' const sideNavList = [ {id: 1, logo: AiFillHome, path: '/', text: 'Home', active: true}, {id: 2, logo: HiFire, path: '/', text: 'Trending', active: false}, {id: 3, logo: SiYoutubegaming, path: '/', text: 'Gaming', active: false}, {id: 4, logo: CgPlayListAdd, path: '/', text: 'Saved Videos', active: false}, ] class SideBar extends Component { state = {initialNavList: sideNavList} render() { return ( {value => { const {isDarkTheme, sideNavList} = value const theme = isDarkTheme ? 'dark' : '' return (
  • {sideNavList.map(eachItem => ( ))}
  • CONTACT US Enjoy! Now to see your channels and recommendations!
    • ) }}     ) } } export default SideBar
